summary: WHEN THE GEAR WAS SHIFTED FROM PARK TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE JERKED WITH OUT WARNING.  *JB   THE CONSUMER WAS INITIALLY TOLD THE  MOTOR MOUNTS WERE BROKEN/WEAK, HOWEVER THE PROBLEM RECURRED, AND THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER, WHO THEN INFORMED THE CONSUMER THE WRONG CHIP WAS USED TO CONTROL THE IDLE SPEED.  THE PROBLEM WAS DUE TO THE TYPE OF EMISSIONS ON THE VEHICLE. PH.   *JB
